defendant_name.name: Wong Pui-hung
defendant_name.source: HKSAR v. WONG PUI HUNG (case title)

age_at_sentencing.source: The defendant is 45 and educated up to secondary school level.

gender.source: He was holding a car key at the time. ("He" referring to the defendant)

education_level.source: The defendant is 45 and educated up to secondary school level.

occupation.source: Prior to his arrest, he was unemployed.

monthly_wage.source: Prior to his arrest, he was unemployed.

criminal_record.source: He has 25 criminal convictions with multiple offences. In particular, he has four trafficking in dangerous drugs and eight possession in dangerous drugs records.
